title: The Low Level of Global Real Interest Rates
content: For release on delivery  9:25 a.m. EDT (10:25 a.m. local time)  July 31, 2017      The Low Level of Global Real Interest Rates         Remarks by     Stanley Fischer     Vice Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Conference to Celebrate Arminio Fraga’s 60 Years     Casa das Garcas, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil                 July 31, 2017
